Class PurposesEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atlan.api.PurposesEndpoint

extends java.lang.Object
    API endpoints for interacting with Atlan's purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • getPurposes

        public static PurposeResponse getPurposes​(java.lang.String filter,
                                          java.lang.String sort,
                                          boolean count,
                                          int offset,
                                          int limit)
                                   throws AtlanException
        Retrieves a list of the purposes defined in Atlan.
        Parameters:
        filter - which purposes to retrieve
        sort - property by which to sort the results
        count - whether to return the total number of records (true) or not (false)
        offset - starting point for results to return, for paging
        limit - maximum number of results to be returned
        Returns:
        a list of purposes that match the provided criteria
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • getPurposes

        public static PurposeResponse getPurposes​(java.lang.String filter)
                                   throws AtlanException
        Retrieves a list of the purposes defined in Atlan.
        Parameters:
        filter - which purposes to retrieve
        Returns:
        a list of purposes that match the provided criteria
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • getAllPurposes

        public static PurposeResponse getAllPurposes()
                                      throws AtlanException
        Retrieve all purposes defined in Atlan.
        Returns:
        a list of all the purposes in Atlan
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • createPurpose

        public static Purpose createPurpose​(Purpose purpose)
                             throws AtlanException
        Create a new purpose.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the details of the new purpose
        Returns:
        details of the created purpose and user/group associations
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • updatePurpose

        public static Purpose updatePurpose​(Purpose purpose)
                             throws AtlanException
        Update a purpose.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the details of the purpose to update (which must include its ID)
        Returns:
        the updated purpose
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue

      • deletePurpose

        public static void deletePurpose​(java.lang.String id)
                          throws AtlanException
        Delete a purpose.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier (GUID) of the purpose to delete
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication issue
